event_description: In the interstellar realm of [Nation Name], an unexpected conflict has arisen with a neighboring alien civilization over the ownership of a seemingly ordinary asteroid that is suspected to contain a rare mineral coveted by both sides. The asteroid, known colloquially as 'Rocky McRockface,' sits on the border between the two territories and has suddenly become the focal point of a heated war of words and diplomatic standoffs. While some politicians advocate for a peaceful resolution through negotiation and sharing of resources, others demand a military show of force to assert dominance in the region. The citizens of [Nation Name] are divided, with some embracing the idea of alien friends and intergalactic trade, while others fear the unknown and cling to the comfort of terrestrial isolationism.

event_options.option_description: Let us extend an olive branch to our alien neighbors! Propose a joint mining operation on Rocky McRockface, sharing the resources and fostering friendly relations with the extraterrestrial community.
event_options.option_outcome: The cooperative effort leads to unprecedented interstellar cooperation and trade agreements, opening up new opportunities for cultural exchange and technological advancement.

event_options.option_description: We must protect our cosmic sovereignty! Deploy the Space Navy to secure Rocky McRockface and demonstrate our unwavering commitment to defending our galactic borders.
event_options.option_outcome: The show of force deters further alien incursions and asserts [Nation Name]'s dominance in the region, but at the cost of heightened interstellar tension and suspicions of warmongering.

event_options.option_description: Embrace the spirit of exploration and discovery! Launch a joint mission with our alien neighbors to explore beyond Rocky McRockface, uncovering new worlds and fostering a sense of unity in the cosmos.
event_options.option_outcome: The joint mission leads to groundbreaking discoveries and strengthens interstellar bonds, paving the way for collaborative scientific advancements and shared cosmic adventures.

event_options.option_description: Prioritize the protection of our own planet and its resources! Shift focus towards sustainable asteroid mining practices and invest in Earth-centric initiatives for a greener future.
event_options.option_outcome: By avoiding the conflict over Rocky McRockface and focusing on sustainable practices, [Nation Name] sets an example for responsible cosmic stewardship, leading to improved environmental policies and global recognition for conservation efforts.
